item.title: Vintage TV
item.description: Welcome back! Hi there, and Merry XMas! When I decided to create a site to introduce myself I had a small personal challenge into my mind: to be able to create something attractive with as few lines of code as possible LOL. The result can be seen on my github page and on my Behance page. It’s nothing more than a nice and unpretentious showcase that wants to present the people who use it in a captivating and exciting way, especially for nostalgics like me who grew up between the 80’s and 90’s.
